question: A bill becomes an act when __________?
option1: It is passed by any house
option2: It is passed by the original house after making amendments suggested by the other house
option3: It is passed by the original house after making suggested amendments by the other house and the President given his / her assent to it
answer: It is passed by the original house after making suggested amendments by the other house and the President given his / her assent to it
explanation: A bill becomes an Act when it is passed by the original house after making suggested amendments by the other house and the President given his / her assent to it.
